diseases.name: COVID-19
diseases.description: Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, antiviral medications for severe cases, consult healthcare provider

diseases.name: Malaria
diseases.description: Malaria is a mosquito-borne infectious disease that affects humans and other animals.
diseases.treatment: Antimalarial medications as prescribed by healthcare provider

diseases.name: Dengue Fever
diseases.description: Dengue is a viral infection transmitted to humans through the bite of infected Aedes mosquitoes.
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, pain relievers (avoid aspirin), increased fluid intake

diseases.name: Tuberculosis
diseases.description: Tuberculosis (TB) is a bacterial infection that mainly affects the lungs but can affect other parts of the body.
prevention: Avoid close contact with TB patients
diseases.treatment: Antibiotics for 6-9 months as prescribed, directly observed treatment

diseases.name: Diabetes Type 2
diseases.description: Type 2 diabetes is a chronic condition that affects the way your body metabolizes sugar (glucose).
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medications as prescribed, blood sugar monitoring

diseases.name: Hypertension
diseases.description: High blood pressure is a common condition in which the long-term force of blood against artery walls is high enough to cause health problems.
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle modifications, antihypertensive medications as prescribed
